summary: Completed comprehensive testing of financial control system. All major functionalities working correctly including dashboard, monthly control, categories management, and reports with charts and CSV export.
passed_tests: Backend API: All 13 endpoints working (100% success rate)
Dashboard: Summary cards displaying correct totals
Dashboard: Charts rendering with data (Evolução Mensal and Distribuição por Categoria)
Navigation: All menu links working correctly
Monthly Control: Data entry for planned and actual values
Monthly Control: Save functionality persisting data
Monthly Control: Totals calculation working correctly
Categories: Color selection and due date setting
Reports: Charts displaying monthly comparison and category expenses
Reports: Annual summary and monthly average sections
End-to-end data flow: Data entered in Monthly Control appears in Dashboard and Reports
